name: To Die For (joba288)
description:
Created For The GMTK 2022 Game Jam!

This game is a platformer shooter where you play as a die. You must roll to reload.

game is very unfinished

this game is so goofy

Art and Music: Dorbellprod 

YT: https://www.youtube.com/c/DingDongDirt

Itch: https://dorbell.itch.io/

Programming: joba288:

Itch: https://joba.itch.io/

Controls:

WASD -Move

Space -Jump

LeftClick -Shoot

RightClick -Reload/Roll - Aim with Mouse

Made in Gamemaker Studio 2
